Package client.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bank
    The Bank class holds resource cards that are available to the players.
    Chat
    The chat class holds the list of messages that have been sent by each player.
    City
    The city class represents a city object.
    ClientModel
    The client side representation of the model.
    DevCards
    Contains information relevant to the Development Card Deck and player Development Cards.
    Hex
    The hex class represents a hex on the map.
    Log
    The Log class represents a log of commands that have happened.
    Map
    The map class represents the game board and everything on it.
    Message
    Message class will be used for the messages in the chat feature.
    Player
    Player class contains all the information for each individual player in the game.
    Port
    Represents a Port on the port, which contains a specific ratio on a specified location on the board.
    Resources
    Keeps track of the number of each resource a player has.
    Road
    The road is an item held by the player.
    Robber
    Robber is a game piece contained in the game.
    Settlement
    Another piece owned by the player.
    TradeOffer
    The TradeOffer class will be used in trades between players and the bank.
    TurnTracker
    Tracks whose turn it currently is, and changes the possession of the Longest road and largest army cards each turn if neccessary.
